text: Ghorashal is a town council in the Palash Upazila in the Narsingdi District in central Bangladesh. According to the 2011 Bangladesh census, its population stood at 748, consisting of 203 households. The village is the home to the largest power plant in Bangladesh, which began operation in 1974. ==References== Category:Populated places in Narsingdi District Category:Municipalities in Dhaka Division
title: Ghorashal
